import React from 'react'; import {Modal,Button,Container,ModalBody,Col,Row,Nav,NavItem,NavLink,TabContent,TabPane,Card,CardTitle,CardText} from 'reactstrap' class FichaProducto extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(); this.state={ modal:false }; this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); } toggle(){ this.setState(prevState=>({ modal: !prevState.modal })); console.log(this.props); } render(){ return(
Special Title Treatment With supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. ); } } export default FichaProducto;
